articles.title: Amateur stuns Sinner on way to 1 Point Slam win - ESPN
articles.description: Sydney amateur Jordan Smith beat defending Australian Open champion Jannik Sinner on his way to claiming the $1 million Australian first prize at the Australian Open's 1 Point Slam.
articles.content:
Jan 14, 2026, 07:08 AM ET
A little-known local amateur player beat Jannik Sinner and went on to make himself a millionaire in Australian dollars after winning the 1 Point Slam on Wednesday at the Au… [+1682 chars]
